message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $11,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
